rationale: When output must be reproducible, use scripts/ instead of heuristics
When context >2000 tokens, split into references/ and use index-style notes
When rules apply to multiple skills, move to .shared/
For complex workflows, add gate steps for validation between phases
When user input is needed, always start with a collect requirements step
When generating code, provide templates in references/ for consistency
For review/audit tasks, output structured checklists
For API calls, use scripts/ with built-in validation
For steps that commonly fail, add a gate with clear error messages
Data/scripts used by multiple skills should live in .shared/
